# Interface RollingSummaryConfigInterface

Interface for configuring rolling summary behavior.

interface RollingSummaryConfigInterface {  
maxSummarySentences?: number;  
numberOfTurnsBeforeSummary?: number;  
startWindowSize?: number;  
textGenerationConfig?: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

maxSummarySentences? numberOfTurnsBeforeSummary? startWindowSize? textGenerationConfig?

## Properties

### `Optional`maxSummarySentences

maxSummarySentences?: number

Maximum number of sentences to include in the summary

### `Optional`numberOfTurnsBeforeSummary

numberOfTurnsBeforeSummary?: number

Number of conversation turns before generating/updating the summary

### `Optional`startWindowSize

startWindowSize?: number

Initial number of turns to consider when creating the first summary

### `Optional`textGenerationConfig

textGenerationConfig?: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration for text generation used in summary processing

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
